title: Create Board of Directors Financial Report
description: An FP&A director needs to create the financial package for the upcoming quarterly board of directors meeting.

tasks.description: Generate all standard financial reports for the quarter (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow Statement).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates all required reports.

tasks.description: Create a summary dashboard with key performance indicators (KPIs) and variance analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a visual dashboard highlighting key financial metrics.

tasks.description: Compile all reports and the dashboard into a single presentation deck for the board.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assembles the final board package.
